name: WP Login Logo
author: Cris9400

sections.description:
View the plugin page for more information and discussion: http://workstation.nerdnet.it/portfolio/wp-login-logo/

WP Login Logo is a simple plugin I made so that I could customise the login screen on my own website by utilising in-built WordPress functions and the WordPress media uploader.
Considering all the bloated plugins and resource intensive implementations floating around, I thought this lightweight codebase and clean UI could be of similar benefit to other WordPress users/developers.

Don’t expect too many fancy bells and whistles, this plugin does one thing, and does it well.

A few notes about the sections above:

  • “Contributors” @Cris9400, @Disy
  • “Tags” login, logo, login logo, admin, customisation, customization, branding, custom login, media uploader, AJAX, wp-login
  • “Requires at least” 3.5 or later
  • “Tested up to” 4.2.2
  • “Stable Version” 1.0.4

sections.installation:
From WordPress Platform

  1. Download and activate from the Plugins page of your WordPress site.

From WordPress WEBSite

  1. Upload directory wp-login-logo to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

or

  1. Upload wp-login-logo.zip with your board plugins installer
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin with any theme?

Yes, This Plugin does not interfere with the normal operation of the themes.

Where do I upload an image?

The path settings of the Plugin is “Settings -> WP Login Logo”

short_description: This plugin is a simple, lightweight WordPress plugin to change your login logo.
